body: Perhaps good to mention that `default_value` must outlive the lifetime of the `AttributeSpec` object (and is this guaranteed? Or should we make a copy of the proto instead and make the member a `const AttrValue` instead of a `const AttrValue*`?
body_html: Perhaps good to mention that default_value must outlive the lifetime of the AttributeSpec object (and is this guaranteed? Or should we make a copy of the proto instead and make the member a const AttrValue instead of a const AttrValue*?
